titles.title: A resolution to make effective appointment of Senate Legal Counsel.
A resolution to make effective appointment of Senate Legal Counsel.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution makes the President pro tempore's appointment of Morgan J. Frankel as Senate Legal Counsel effective January 3, 2023, for a term of service to expire at the end of the 119th Congress.
